name: Today's Training Regime
description:
Hi everybody! Syoudre here, thank you for trying out this script! It involves on my fursona, Gao,  and my boss' sona, Fenrir

The story is just about the two training together in the middle of the night and showing off their flashy danmaku. I don't

think I have anything else much to say other than thank you once again, and please Enjoy!

How to run the game:

-Optional: Config and set to your preferred configuration.

-Open th_dnh_ph3sx.exe (or th_dnh_ph3sx_legacy.exe)

-Optional: Go to Options and adjust the settings.

-Have fun!

Credits:

Today's Training Regime

A Bullet Hell Artistry # 4 entry

By Syoudre

Discord: Syoudre#8210

Story / Graphic Design - UI / Sound / Programming / Artworks By Syoudre

Thank you for playing!

~Until next time~
